page.title: 15ROAD SAFETY IN CARBOST
page.content: Traffic is quite heavy on the single track road through our village, with heavy lorries travelling to and from the distillery, coal yard, garage,petrol pumps and shop.This creates many problems and many tourists were adding to the problem by travelling much too fast through the area. The Community Council put up a speed limit sign to see if that would help ease the situation.Recently the road has been improved but is still really single track and too congested.A new pavement was made running almost the full length of the village to add some safety for pedestrians.Street lighting was also erected making quite a difference to the place especially in the winter months.
